mapper.select: SELECT dpro.id, dpro.admin_password, dpro.grafana_domain, dpro.object_version_number, (SELECT dpv.name FROM devops_pv dpv WHERE dpv.id = dpro.prometheus_pv_id and dpv.status='Available') AS PROMETHEUS_PV_NAME, (SELECT dpv.name FROM devops_pv dpv WHERE dpv.id = dpro.grafana_pv_id and dpv.status='Available') AS GRAFANA_PV_NAME, (SELECT dpv.name FROM devops_pv dpv WHERE dpv.id = dpro.alertmanager_pv_id and dpv.status='Available') AS ALERTMANAGER_PV_NAME FROM devops_prometheus dpro WHERE dpro.id = #{id}
